content: परागः {@--1@} The pollen of a flower; स्फुटपरागपरागतपंकजं <ls>Śi. 6. 2</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 54.</ls> {@--2@} Dust in general; <ls>R. 4. 30.</ls> {@--3@} Fragrant powder used after bathing. {@--4@} Sandal. {@--5@} An eclipse of the sun or moon. {@--6@} Fame, celebrity. {@--7@} Independence, self-will.
